1564850670_17FTEKfnFVM6XGctStcwZLue3N8Bx.body: I want to use multiuser. I want to be able to log into each user with my private key. It makes sense that I should be able to do that, and particularly when publishing anonymously using a shared ID it is important. I removed multiuser_local from the conf file, and now it treats the default login as a proxy. I'm just expressing observed behavior hoping the feature will we edited for functionality or ease of use.

1564490734_19EXEdNhHM294ahirgwYjiLwSiuao.body: No matter how you are accomplishing this, if you are accomplishing this you are giving your exit IP addresses a bad reputation, probably resulting in blacklisting. This is not productive for anyone and certainly not something to  be abused for the purpose of power tripping, showing off, or entertainment.
